title: "AI-based prediction for the risk of coronary heart disease among patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus"
excerpt: "Type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM) is one common chronic disease caused by insulin secretion disorder that often leads to severe outcomes and even death due to complications, among which coronary heart disease (CHD) represents the most common and severe one."
